reviewDetails.comment: I have been going to Dr. Haber for 25 years since he did my biopsy back then for Dr. Davies.  Someone else in another facility did a "botched biopsy" prior.  He is an excellent doctor and very careful and skilled with his biopsies.
Very knowledgeable. Takes the time to listen to patients

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Kuwama is great, he takes his time to explain your symptoms and what treatment is required.
He is very humble, friendly and gives enough information to a patient with the language and concept which a patient can easily understand.
Appropriate analysis and medical guidance can be provided.
Knowledgeable and has good bedside manner.
Great personnel and very helpful
Over all it was pleasant visit. He was through and answered all the questions.
I had a great experience with Dr. Kuwama. He is very cheerful and a great listener.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Rosales, lives up to her reviews. She listened and was able to talk pragmatically about my concerns. Very happy with my visit.
Knows what she’s talking about, explain everything and the procedure and causes of sickness
Dr. Rosales takes great notes, makes sure you feel comfortable, has a great energy, and is always willing to answer questions about your health and results in full if you ask!
Doctor Rosales was wonderful. Very straightforward and kind.
She did her best to understand my anxiety and gave a kind and easy explanation.

Dr. Rosales is friendly, a great listener, and always displays a thoughtful caring attitude to all my medical concerns.  She makes you feel comfortable, is efficient and always follows up with excellent medical care and advice.
She is very kindness.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Galichon listen's carefully to what you are saying and provides the care necessary to make you feel better.  She also advocates preventive care and makes recommendations and/or provides the means to achieve keeping up with your health needs.

I have found Dr. Galichon to be direct and professional. I think that her bedside manner and interpersonal communication skills are immaculate. I dread doctor appointments, but she makes the experience pleasant and comfortable.

I visited the office because I had been sick for several days. My doctor was not available for a day of appointment so I scheduled with Dr. Galichon.  She came in briefly, did a flu test and never returned.  the nurse came back stood at the door and said they will give you a print our at the receptionist desk.  There was no followup with the doctor to tell me what was going on with me nor from the nurse.  and on the print out basically told me to loose weight.  I went in because I was sick not because I was having weight related issues.

My visits are too matter of fact, she seems too impersonal. I am use to my immediate physician to show some concern for my well being. Dr. Galichon seems not to be interested in  what is physically wrong. She seems to be just interested in getting you in and out. Perhaps other doctors in the network are different.
Dr. Galichon is always pleasant and compassionate.  She listens without predetermination, focus on person centered care.
Friendly and thorough. Wait was longer than expected, but kindness made up for it.

reviewDetails.comment: Very thorough examination, answers questions.

I found Dr. Stein to be kind, patient and thoughtful. I am usually somewhat anxious with doctors, but he immediately put me at ease. He answered all of my questions and followed up with me the following day to discuss test results. I wish that I had found him several years ago.
He is super intelligent, super compassionate, caring, smart as a ship, through. I would marry him but we’re both married to other people. He’s incredible. I recommend him all the time.
Dr. Stein is extremely knowledgeable and takes his time with each patient.

He is incredibly thorough, professional and polite.  He is also one of the best in his field.  The head of orthopedics asked who my primary care physician was and when I said it was Dr. Stein, he replied, „He‘s also my primary care physician.“   He is the very best.
Takes his time ask you all the right questions.

reviewDetails.comment: She always takes her time to listen to the patient and explains everything well. I’m always comfortable to talk to her!

I found my experience with Dr Chu troubling. There was no attempt to build rapport on our first meeting, nor an apology for being late. I was questioned when I asked for a specific treatment plan & told it wouldn’t work. Oddly, instead of prescribing medicine that would work, Dr Chu gave me the meds which I find to be lazy medicine. Why not prescribe a real solution? Her staff treated me disrespectfully as well. Can’t recommend
Dr. Chu is terrific — smart, personable, and easy to talk to. She is very thorough and explains things well. I definitely recommend her!
Dr Chu is very professional. She is thorough and makes you feel at ease. I would highly recommend her

Dr Chu was polite, friendly and efficient. 
I recommend!

schools.name: Rosalind Franklin U Of Med & Science, Chicago Med

reviewDetails.comment: Punctual, professional, and good doctor... I’m happy with my decision and will be loyal to this doctor.
Impatient, unfriendly, kept cutting me off. Just a very unpleasant experience all around. He spent maybe 5 minutes with me. The PA was kind and apologized for his behavior after he left the room.

This dermatology office needs a full revamp. They are unorganized and don’t follow through on what they say they will. Video tele-health session was not communicated well. At time of appointment doctor never came to video platform, instead he just called. He never emailed the follow up he promised. Also you can’t call the office directly to speak to anyone. You go through a call service and the doctor/ office are terrible at returning calls. Do not go to this office.
Doctor and staff push a specialty pharmacy on their patients and make it very difficult to have prescriptions sent to their own home pharmacy.
I had two issues and he literally said “I’m not sure what to do” about both. Not a good feeling when your doctor isn’t confident...
No, He didn't give a answer to my problem because he didn't know and he didn't perform any test.
He is incredible! I have been going to him for 5 years.

Very good.
